item.title: Dental Diagnostic
item.description: Maddie lost a tooth this evening. As I was brushing my teeth this evening, I wondered whether she has teeth like mine or more like Cami's. It seems we should be able to learn a lot about our future teeth by sending in recently lost teeth in for lab work. Perhaps DNA/chromosome testing could happen in the same go.
